word_mean: 肠：上自胃的幽门下至肛门的消化管：见intestinum项下，又称bowel和gut

sentence.Network_en: This drug lowers cholesterol levels by binding fats in the intestine.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种药通过黏合肠内的脂肪降低胆固醇水平。

sentence.Network_en: the viscid lining of the intestine
The tapeworm is an inhabitant of the intestine.
sentence.Network_cn: 绦虫是栖居肠内的寄生虫.

list.abs: 回肠：有肠绒毛（英语：Intestinal villus）可以吸收维生素B12及胆汁酸，也可以吸收其他养份。盲肠：连接着阑尾结肠：包括升结肠 …
(2)肠上皮化生(intestinal metaplasia) 这种化生常见于胃体和/或胃窦部。肠上皮化生常见于慢性萎缩性胃炎、胃溃疡及胃粘膜糜烂后粘 …
洗_百度百科 ... ⑾ 整治；雕琢[ revamp;trim;carve] 洗肠[ intestinal lavage] 洗床[ shell].
各种疾病的英文_百度文库 ... intestinal obstruction 肠梗阻 intestinal tuberculosis 肠结核 lipoma 脂肪瘤.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin intestinum, neuter of intestinus, from intus 'within'

entry.def: Your intestines are the tubes in your body through which food passes when it has left your stomach.

example.ex: This area is always tender to the touch if the intestines are not functioning properly...
example.tran: 如果肠功能不正常,这个部位碰一下就会感到疼痛。

example.ex: This vitamin is absorbed through the walls of the small intestine.
example.tran: 这种维生素通过小肠壁被吸收。

means.word_mean: 1. the part of the alimentary canal between the stomach and the anus
